page.title: 08Home Life 2 - Yardley
page.content: When I got up on Sunday I had breakfast and then my dad took me to my nan for the day.We arrived about 11:00a.m.My uncle was there and I had not seen him for about six months.It was great to see him.He and my dad went for a drink and when they came back from the pub we had dinner.My nan had to cook for eight because my cousins were there as well and my nan does not like people sitting there,not eating.We did not finish dinner until about 3:30 p.m. and then I helped my nan wash up.She was very grateul.A 4:30 we sat down and had a cup of tea and watched television for 3 hours.We had our tea at 7:30.We had sandwiches,cake and a drink.About 9:30 my dad and I left.We caught the bus home quite quickly and got in about 10:00.I had a bath,watched television until about 11:00 and went to bed.
